definitions.definition: To think of highly, to respect highly; to show respect for; to recognise the importance or spiritual value of
definitions.example: The freedom fighters will be forever remembered and honored by the people.

definitions.definition: To conform to, abide by, act in accordance with (an agreement, treaty, promise, request, or the like)
definitions.example: I trusted you, but you have not honored your promise.

definitions.definition: To confer (bestow) an honour or privilege upon (someone)
definitions.example: Ten members of the profession were honored at the ceremony.

definitions.definition: To make payment in respect of (a cheque, banker's draft, etc.)
definitions.example: I'm sorry Sir, but the bank did not honour your cheque.
